summary: Implemented an in-app “Share Hornet Hive” feature on the Profile page using the Web Share API with a clipboard-based fallback (plus an additional legacy copy fallback), including toast feedback via sonner.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a legacy copy-to-clipboard fallback using document.execCommand('copy') (in addition to the requested navigator.clipboard fallback).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-18 only specifies a non-Web-Share fallback via navigator.clipboard when available; the legacy execCommand method is extra behavior not explicitly requested.
